mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_invites (chat_id, invite_code, code_hash, expires_at, max_uses, used_count, revoked, created_by, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{chatId}, #{inviteCode}, #{codeHash}, #{expiresAt}, #{maxUses}, #{usedCount}, #{revoked}, #{createdBy}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE chat_invites SET used_count = used_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE chat_id = #{chatId} AND code_hash = #{codeHash} AND revoked = 0 AND expires_at > NOW()
AND (max_uses = 0 OR used_count < max_uses)
mapper.select: SELECT id, chat_id, invite_code, code_hash, expires_at, max_uses, used_count, revoked, created_by, create_time, update_time FROM chat_invites WHERE chat_id = #{chatId} AND revoked = 0 AND expires_at > NOW() AND (max_uses = 0 OR used_count < max_uses) ORDER BY create_time DESC
